articles.title: Waiting for a shoe to drop in the US jobs market - AP News
articles.description: Trouble may be coming for the American job market. But it’s probably not here yet. The U.S. Labor Department is expected to report Friday that employers added 135,000 jobs last month. That would be down from a surprisingly strong 228,000 in March. But it woul…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Trouble may be coming for the American job market as President Donald Trump wages trade wars, purges federal workers and deports immigrants working in the United States illegally. But… [+4882 chars]
